fields.title: Tint Method
fields.description: Tint multiplied to the color. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the "rain" and "temperature" of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint.

fields.title: Texture
fields.description: The texture name used for the particle.

description: [Note: This component is currently experimental]. Sets the particles that will be used when block is destroyed.
title: Destruction Particles
